name: Russian Car Driver 2: ZIL 130
description:
The best game in the world is back!
Feel like the owner of a real Soviet legend of
automotive industry and discover the open world with the atmosphere
Russia!

In the game you are waiting for:
- Unique career line.
- A lot of game modes.
- Improvement, repair and maintenance of your transport.
- Wide open world.
- Truck racing championship.
- The history of ZIL 130.
- Garage equipment.
- Opening your own transport company.
